author: 𝓳 @motelwhcres

comments.author: 𝓳 @motelwhcres
comments.content:
First of all, DO NOT DELETE THE APP! 
It will be unavailable to you on your App Store but they can’t actually get rid of the app from your phone unless you delete it, incase it does disappear and u need to redownload you’ll have to change your region on the App Store

comments.author: 𝓳 @motelwhcres
comments.content:
Secondly download a VPN, there’s tons of good accessible vpns available ExpressVpn, NordVpn 
But ! 
I’ve been using this one for FREE and it’s never ever given me any trouble x

comments.author: 𝓳 @motelwhcres
comments.content: Keep in mind using a vpn is extremely battery draining though, I keep it on in the background throughout the day but incase you’re having trouble w certain apps all of a sudden it’s most likely your vpn !

comments.author: 𝓳 @motelwhcres
comments.content: It is important to note you CANNOT post videos using a VPN from a country where TikTok is banned, because they can very well track your IP and your videos and content will not have any reach at all unfortunately so for those of you who are editors / creators I’m sorry

comments.author: 𝓳 @motelwhcres
comments.content: Some filters / beautify may not work but it’s not the end of the world your overall app experience will not be affected in a major way you can still comment, like, repost and watch your favorite creators

comments.author: 𝓳 @motelwhcres
comments.content: If the app buffers or glitches just restart your vpn or exit and reopen the app

comments.author: 𝓳 @motelwhcres
comments.content: Other than that the rest remains pretty much the same ! If any of you have any doubts feel free to dm me :) ik it’s incredibly frustrating but I’ve gotten pretty used to it now & it’s not all that bad xx

comments.author: 𝓳 @motelwhcres
comments.content: While you’re here feel free to follow & support i promise im super fun to be friends with <3

comments.author: 𝓳 @motelwhcres
comments.content: Hi guys !! Updating this now that TikTok is officially banned in the US, a lot of you are DMing me saying the VPN thing isn’t working bc ur account originates from the US. Idk the technicalities of this VPN seems to work for the rest of us from banned countries I’m sorry!!

comments.author: 𝓳 @motelwhcres
comments.content: I wasn’t trying to give any of you false hope at all I was just letting you know what works for me and trying to be helpful just incase that works for you gonna miss you guys on that app <3

content: TikToks been banned in my country for 4 years and I still use it on the daily here’s a how, a thread for my American mutuals;
